reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering, particularly appreciating its square neckline and how it accentuates their figure, while also praising its thick, athletic material and comfortable fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress!
items.body: I love this dress! The material is thick enough to feel high-quality but still breathable, so it’s great for warm days or running around. It has a sporty, athletic feel, but the fit is super flattering and dressy, so you can wear it casually or easily dress it up. No weird smell, very comfortable, and the stretch makes it easy to move in. I also love that it doesn’t show sweat easily - huge win. Definitely worth it! Read more
items.author: Macy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect little black dress
items.body: Fits beautifully, hugging you in all the right places. Heavy weight and durable fabric. The fabric feels like athletic leggings. Did not have an odor upon opening. Read more
items.author: madelyn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's great! You can't go wrong for this price and this fit
items.body: A solid 4.5 ⭐. This dress was affordable and cute so I had to give it a try. I am always looking for confortable outfits and this one does not disappoint. But it really depends on your body type and looking at reviews the measurements they put. I'm normall a Medium in GAP, and I sized up to a large. I have 31 inch waist, 41 inch hip and small bust but wider ribcage 37.5 ish. I'm 5'3" and 155 lbs, my weight distribution is pretty even, I have an athletic body type and my arms have weight to them. So all that to say is I really did not know what to expect. Pro: -The dress material is soft and has some stretch, the black color is classic and the fit is good. -the length is alright not too short and not long, but I'm 5'3, so for me it's a tad long. Some conservative peeps might find this to be the perfect length, but for me, I might just tailor it up and inch. -perfect fall/winter date dress -perfect shopping/city travel dress Con: -The chest and stomach area is fitted, which makes my small chest "A" look a bit squeezed in and a bit flatter (but I'll try this dress with a bra and see if that fixes it, although I really want to make this work without a bra, since it's so soft and compressive already). I do have to point out that on my body, despite the more compressive parts of the chest and stomach, it's not uncomfortable, but I can imagine my larger chested girlies finding this to be too tight and "the girls" squished in. Overall, small minus, mostly pros, and I will be looking at other colors too! Read more
items.author: FC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not chubby girl approved, though it really could've been.
items.body: I share in what other reviewers say about how sturdy the fabric is. This dress does compress well and isn't visually see through. I am, however, returning it for the following reasons: It's not VISUALLY see-through, but the fabric is so tight you can see any shapewear or underwear underneath it, barring maybe like a full unitard, which I don't own. The muffintop at the top of tights would also show :( I can't wear a proper bra, which would be nice at my size and build. The square neckline is very wide and the bra will show no matter what. I do like the styling of a wide neck, and I think it keeps the dress from being too boring, but with how unforgiving the tight fabric is I don't feel confident letting my tig ol biddies do whatever they want. The seem to want to sit in my armpits in this dress. On me, this comes VERY short. XL is my standard size--there was nothing for me to size up to--and I feel like more size options would've made me exchange this instead of returning it. If you're midsized (US size 12) or smaller and comfortable with little-to-no structure underneath,, this is a well-constructed and gorgeous little dress. You should size up for more breathing room! The airy blue is true to color and very feminine and flattering. I'll come back if they ever add more sizes! Read more
items.author: n/a

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Súper cute
items.body: I loved the dress, the super pretty color, I am size L, I ordered size M, it fit me perfectly, it fits the body, elastic, the fabric is super rich, I loved how it looked on me, I recommend it Read more
items.author: Christian Rivera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I seriously can’t say enough great things about this dress! I had very low expectations for it, bc usually how Amazon clothes are pictured vs how they actually are IRL are vastly different. This one is spot-on and so flattering! I think it could be great for all body sizes and a majority of chest sizes (unless you have like super duper huge boobs, but I could be wrong). The square neckline is also surprisingly flattering. I have a small chest (small B cup) and a single mastectomy and it was flattering/ didn’t gap on my flat side. The material is very comfortable, like an athletic dress and the quality of the material was better than expected (again, usually amazons clothing is pretty cheap). The dress has some stretch and the material is not see-through. I sized to a large and I was very comfortable in it (I don’t Iike things super tight). For reference, I am 5’7” and ~140#. I think if I ordered a medium, it would have been ok, but just a little tight in the arms and also possibly a bit too short, as other buyers had mentioned. I definitely can’t recommend this dress enough— I want to buy it in every color! Go on and order one! Read more
items.author: C. S.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but DIRTY
items.body: Came COMPLETELY filthy. I ordered for a specific occasion, with no time to return (shipping to Alaska takes 3 weeks). You can clearly see the pit and deodorant stains. Other than that, it fits well. However, the waist is quite itchy. I hope to wear it after a good wash. Read more
items.author: Trish Casady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.
items.body: I love this dress. Great quality. Thick material. I did size up to a large. It is tight but I'm a larger chested lady and its tight enough it holds the girls in and I dont have to wear a bra. Read more
items.author: casey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Carob Brown, White, Airy Blue, Chestnut, Light Green, Black, Tea Leaf, Azalea. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
